name: Invasion of the Blob - GMTK2020
description:
Relive 80s classic Horror Films, by setting loose an army of slime blobs to absorb anything they come across! Tables, toys, people, nothing is safe from these amorphous creatures. Unleash them in the right position and watch as they grow out of control! We highly appreciate it if you could give us your honest rating.

Note: To play the game, download the zip file below, unzip the entire folder somewhere on your computer, and double click "gmtk2020.exe".
